metadata.title: App Store Connect API 3.6 release notes

inlineContent.text: App Store Connect API version 3.6 provides resources that enable you to automate actions you take in App Store Connect.
Win-back offers can now be configured using
. These are offers to bring back churned or expired customers to a subscription.  To learn more, see
endpoints to manage images for promoting subscriptions and in-app purchases.
Age ratings for Australia and Korea can be read using
There are two new attributes available for age rating declarations. Use
report type now has a detailed and summary monthly option for
. To learn more, see the “Availability in China mainland” section in
Developers can now upload screenshots for Apple Watch Series 10, to learn more about possible values, see
Developers can now add an app encryption declaration for a given app using
now produces more readable names for the App Store Connect API operations.
normalized to all caps values such as
resources now has more optional filters, including
endpoints have been deprecated and replaced with

abstract.text: Automate the tasks you perform on the Apple Developer website and in App Store Connect.
Attributes whose values you’re changing as part of the update request.
The attributes that describe an In-App event.
Configure win-back offers for your auto-renewable subscriptions with the App Store Connect API.
Read App Store information including your App Store state, age ratings, Brazil age rating, and kids’ age band.
Get information for a specific app store version.
Find and list apps in App Store Connect.
Download sales and trends reports filtered by your specified criteria.
Get a list of price points for an auto-renewable subscription by territory.

doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/docum.title: List All Price Points for a Subscription

abstract.text: Provide age-related information so the App Store can determine the age rating for your app.
Add an app encryption delcaration for a specific app.
A string that represents the display type of an app screenshot.
A length of time that can be assigned to a subscription.
Strings that represent versions of App Store Server Notifications.
The attributes that describe a territory availability resource.

abstract.text: Create, modify, and delete promotion images for your in-app purchases.
Create, commit, and delete images for a promoted in-app purchase.
Create, modify, and delete promotion images for your auto-renewalable subscription.
Create and manage win-back offers for your auto-renewable subscriptions.
